TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileUpload extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

summary.span: 显示一个文本框控件和一个浏览按钮，使用户可以选择要上载到服务器的文件。

span.span: Displays a text box control and a browse button that enable users to select a file to upload to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [简介Introduction](#introduction) - [正在保存上载的文件Saving Uploaded Files](#saving_uploaded_files) - [安全注意事项Security Considerations](#security_considerations) - [内存限制Memory Limitations](#memory_limitations) - [将 FileUpload 控件与 UpdatePanel 控件一起使用Using the FileUpload Control with the UpdatePanel Control](#using_the_FileUpload_Control_with_the_UpdatePanel_control) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 简介Introduction 类将显示一个文本框控件和一个浏览按钮，使用户可以在客户端上选择文件并将其上传到 Web 服务器。The class displays a text box control and a browse button that enable users to select a file on the client and upload it to the Web server. 用户通过输入本地计算机上文件的完整路径来指定要上传的文件 (例如，在控件文本框中 **C:\MyFiles\TestFile.txt**) 。The user specifies the file to upload by entering the full path of the file on the local computer (for example, **C:\MyFiles\TestFile.txt**) in the text box of the control. 或者，用户可以通过单击 " **浏览** " 按钮选择该文件，然后在 " **选择文件** " 对话框中找到它。Alternately, the user can select the file by clicking the **Browse** button, and then locating it in the **Choose File** dialog box. 使用 属性可获取客户端上使用控件上载的文件的名称 。Use the property to get the name of a file on a client to upload by using the control. 此属性返回的文件名不包括客户端上文件的路径。The file name that this property returns does not include the path of the file on the client. 属性获取一个 指向要上传的文件的对象。The property gets a object that points to a file to upload. 使用此属性以字节的形式访问该文件的内容。Use this property to access the contents of the file as bytes. 例如，你可以使用 属性返回的对象将 文件内容作为字节来读取，并将其存储在字节数组中。For example, you can use the object that is returned by the property to read the contents of the file as bytes and store them in a byte array. 或者，可以使用 属性来检索文件中的所有字节。Alternatively, you can use the property to retrieve all the bytes in the file. 属性获取 要上载的文件的基础对象。The property gets the underlying object for the file to upload. 您可以使用此属性来访问该文件的其他属性。You can use this property to access additional properties on the file. 属性获取文件的长度。The property gets the length of the file. 属性获取文件的 MIME 内容类型。The property gets the MIME content type of the file. 此外，还可以使用 属性来访问 属性、 属性和 方法。In addition, you can use the property to access the property, the property, and the method. 但是， 属性、 属性和方法提供了相同的功能 。However, the same functionality is provided by the property, the property, and the method. ## 正在保存上载的文件Saving Uploaded Files 用户选择要上载的文件后，控件不会自动将文件保存到服务器。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您必须显式提供一个控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供一个按钮，用户单击它即可上传文件。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. 你编写的用于保存指定文件的代码应调用 方法，该方法会将文件内容保存到服务器上的指定路径。The code that you write to save the specified file should call the method, which saves the contents of a file to a specified path on the server. 通常， 在引发回发到服务器的事件的事件处理方法中调用方法。Typically, the method is called in an event-handling method for an event that raises a post back to the server. 例如，如果你提供了一个用于提交文件的按钮，则可以包含代码以将该文件保存在 click 事件的事件处理方法内。For example, if you provide a button to submit a file, you could include the code to save the file inside the event-handling method for the click event. 在调用 方法以将文件保存到服务器之前，请使用 属性来验证 控件是否包含文件。Before calling the method to save the file to the server, use the property to verify that the control contains a file. 如果 返回 `true` ，则调用 方法。If the returns `true`, call the method. 如果它返回 `false` ，则向用户显示一条消息，指示该控件不包含文件。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 不要检查 属性以确定要上传的文件是否存在，因为默认情况下，此属性包含0个字节。Do not check the property to determine whether a file to upload exists because, by default, this property contains 0 bytes. 因此，即使 控件为空白，属性也将 返回一个非 null 值。As a result, even when the control is blank, the property returns a non-null value. ## 安全注意事项Security Considerations 调用 方法时，必须指定要在其中保存上载文件的目录的完整路径。When you call the method, you must specify the full path of the directory in which to save the uploaded file. 如果未在应用程序代码中显式指定路径，则当用户尝试上传文件时，将引发异常。If you do not explicitly specify a path in your application code, an exception is thrown when a user attempts to upload a file. 此行为可防止用户在应用程序的目录结构中写入任意位置以及阻止对敏感的根目录的访问，从而有助于保护服务器上的文件的安全。This behavior helps keep the files on the server secure by preventing users from being able to write to arbitrary locations in your application's directory structure, as well as preventing access to sensitive root directories. 方法将上传的文件写入指定的目录。The method writes the uploaded file to the specified directory. 因此，ASP.NET 应用程序必须具有对服务器上的目录的写访问权限。Therefore, the ASP.NET application must have write access to the directory on the server. 应用程序可以通过两种方式获取写入访问权限。There are two ways that the application can get write access. 你可以在将保存上载文件的目录中显式授予对运行应用程序的帐户的写入权限。You can explicitly grant write access to the account under which the application is running, in the directory in which the uploaded files will be saved. 或者，可以增加授予 ASP.NET 应用程序的信任级别。Alternatively, you can increase the level of trust that is granted to the ASP.NET application. 若要对应用程序的执行目录进行写入访问，必须为应用程序授予 信任级别设置为值的对象 。To get write access to the executing directory for the application, the application must be granted the object with the trust level set to the value. 提高信任级别会增加应用程序访问服务器上资源的权限。Increasing the level of trust increases the application's access to resources on the server. 请注意，这并不是一种安全的方法，因为获得您的应用程序控制的恶意用户也可以在这一更高的信任级别下运行。Note that this is not a secure approach, because a malicious user who gains control of your application will also be able to run under this higher level of trust. 最佳做法是在用户的上下文中运行 ASP.NET 应用程序，该用户具有运行应用程序所需的最小特权。It is a best practice to run an ASP.NET application in the context of a user with the minimum privileges that are required for the application to run. 有关 ASP.NET 应用程序中的安全性的详细信息，请参阅 [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zdh19h94(v=vs.100)) 和 [ASP.NET 信任级别和策略文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1)。For more information about security in ASP.NET applications, see [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zdh19h94(v=vs.100)) and [ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1). ## 内存限制Memory Limitations 防范拒绝服务攻击的一种方法是限制可使用控件上传的文件的大小 。One way to guard against denial of service attacks is to limit the size of the files that can be uploaded by using the control. 应设置适用于预计要上传的文件类型的大小限制。You should set a size limit that is appropriate for the types of files that you expect to be uploaded. 默认大小限制为 4096 kb (KB) 或 4 mb (MB) 。The default size limit is 4096 kilobytes (KB), or 4 megabytes (MB). 可以通过设置 HttpRuntime 元素的属性，允许上载更大的文件 `maxRequestLength` 。 [httpRuntime](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100))You can allow larger files to be uploaded by setting the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) element. 若要为整个应用程序增加允许的最大文件大小，请 `maxRequestLength` 在 Web.config 文件中设置属性。To increase the maximum allowable file size for the entire application, set the `maxRequestLength` attribute in the Web.config file. 若要增加指定页允许的最大文件大小，请 `maxRequestLength` `location` 在 Web.config 中的元素内设置特性。有关示例，请参阅 [Location 元素 (ASP.NET Settings Schema) ](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b6x6shw7(v=vs.100))。To increase the maximum allowable file size for a specified page, set the `maxRequestLength` attribute inside the `location` element in Web.config. For an example, see [location Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/b6x6shw7(v=vs.100)). 上传大型文件时，用户可能还会收到以下错误消息：When uploading large files, a user might also receive the following error message: `aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520) was recycled because memory consumption exceeded 460 MB (60 percent of available RAM).` 如果用户遇到此错误消息，请将 `memoryLimit` [processModel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) 的元素的值增加到应用程序的 Web.config 文件。If your users encounter this error message, increase the value of the `memoryLimit` attribute in the [processModel](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) of element the Web.config file for the application. `memoryLimit`特性指定辅助进程可使用的最大内存量。The `memoryLimit` attribute specifies the maximum amount of memory that a worker process can use. 如果工作进程超出了该 `memoryLimit` 数量，则将创建一个新进程来替换它，并将所有当前请求重新分配给新进程。If the worker process exceeds the `memoryLimit` amount, a new process is created to replace it, and all current requests are reassigned to the new process. 若要控制在处理请求时，要上传的文件是否暂时存储在内存中，或在服务器上进行处理，请设置 `requestLengthDiskThreshold` [httpRuntime](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性。To control whether the file to upload is temporarily stored in memory or on the server while the request is being processed, set the `requestLengthDiskThreshold` attribute of the [httpRuntime](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) element. 此属性使你能够管理输入流缓冲区的大小。This attribute enables you to manage the size of the input stream buffer. 默认值为256字节。The default is 256 bytes. 指定的值不应超过为属性指定的值 `maxRequestLength` 。The value that you specify should not exceed the value that you specify for the `maxRequestLength` attribute. ## 将 FileUpload 控件与 UpdatePanel 控件一起使用Using the FileUpload Control with the UpdatePanel Control 控件设计为仅用于回发方案，而不是在部分页面呈现期间在异步回发方案中使用。The control is designed to be used only in postback scenarios and not in asynchronous postback scenarios during partial-page rendering. 在控件内使用控件时 ，必须使用作为面板对象的控件来上载该文件 。When you use a control inside an control, the file must be uploaded by using a control that is a object for the panel. 控件用于更新页面的选定区域，而不是使用回发来更新整个页面。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [UpdatePanel 控件概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100)) 和 [部分页呈现概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386454(v=vs.100)) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/bb386573(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目： [下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191897)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191897). 本部分包含以下四个示例：This section contains the following four examples: - 第一个示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件将文件保存到在代码中指定的路径。The first example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. - 第二个示例演示如何创建一个将 文件保存到应用程序文件系统中指定目录的控件。The second example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified directory in the file system for the application. - 第三个示例演示如何创建一个将 文件保存到指定路径的控件，并限制可上载的文件的大小。The third example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified path and limits the size of the file that can be uploaded. - 第四个示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件将文件保存到指定的路径，并只允许上传具有 .doc 或 .xls 文件扩展名的文件。The fourth example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified path and allows only files that have the .doc or .xls file name extensions to be uploaded. > [!CAUTION] > 这些示例演示了控件的基本语法 ，但并不演示了在保存文件之前应完成的所有必要错误检查。These examples demonstrate the basic syntax for the control, but they do not demonstrate all the necessary error checking that should be completed before to saving the file. 有关更完整的示例，请参见 。For a more complete example, see . 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件将文件保存到在代码中指定的路径。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. 调用方法以将文件保存到服务器上的指定路径。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/cs/fileuploadclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/VB/fileuploadclass1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件将文件保存到应用程序文件系统中的指定目录。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a specified directory in the file system for the application. 属性用于获取当前正在执行的服务器应用程序的根目录的物理文件系统路径。The property is used to get the physical file system path of the root directory for the currently executing server application. 调用方法以将文件保存到服务器上的指定路径。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass2/cs/fileuploadclass2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass2/VB/fileuploadclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件将文件保存到代码中指定的路径。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in the code. 控件限制可上传到 2 MB 的文件的大小。The control limits the size of the file that can be uploaded to 2 MB. 属性用于访问基础 属性并返回文件的大小。The property is used to access the underlying property and return the size of the file. 如果要上传的文件的大小小于 2 MB，则 调用方法以将文件保存到服务器上的指定路径。If the size of the file to upload is less than 2 MB, the method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. 除了在应用程序代码中检查 "最大文件大小" 设置，还可以将 `maxRequestLength` [httpRuntime](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) 元素的属性设置为应用程序配置文件中允许的最大大小。In addition to checking for the maximum file size setting in your application code, you can set the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e1f13641(v=vs.100)) element to a maximum allowable size in the configuration file for your application. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass3/cs/fileuploadclass3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass3/VB/fileuploadclass3vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件将文件保存到代码中指定的路径。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in the code. 此示例只允许上传具有 .doc 或 .xls 文件扩展名的文件。This example allows only files that have the .doc or .xls file name extensions to be uploaded. 调用方法以返回要上传的文件的扩展名。The method is called to return the extension of the file to upload. 如果该文件的文件扩展名为 .doc 或 .xls，则 调用方法将该文件保存到服务器上的指定路径。If the file has a .doc or .xls file name extension, the method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass4/cs/fileuploadclass4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass4/VB/fileuploadclass4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use the constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 用户选择要上载的文件后，控件不会自动将文件保存到服务器。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您必须显式提供一个控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供一个按钮，用户单击它即可上传文件。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何初始化类的新实例 。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a new instance of the class. 请注意，此示例演示了构造函数语法，但在创建后不会向控件添加功能。Note that this example demonstrates the constructor syntax but does not add functionality to the control after it is created. 此示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法主要由控件开发人员用来将适当的特性和样式插入 控件的输出流中 。The method is primarily used by control developers to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the output stream for a control. 方法将重写 方法。The method overrides the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不会从客户端自动读取文件。The control does not automatically read the file from the client. 您必须显式提供一个控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供一个按钮，用户可以单击该按钮来上传文件。For example, you can provide a button that the user can click to upload the file. 你编写的用于保存指定文件的代码可以调用 属性，该属性将返回文件的内容。The code that you write to save the specified file could call the property, which returns the contents of the file. 在调用 属性之前，应使用 属性来验证 控件是否包含要上载的文件。Before calling the property, you should use the property to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 如果 返回 `true` ，则调用 属性。If the returns `true`, call the property. 如果它返回 `false` ，则向用户显示一条消息，指示该控件不包含文件。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 如果未提供错误处理代码来验证文件是否存在，则尝试保存不存在的文件会引发 异常。If you do not provide error-handling code to verify that a file exists, an attempt to save a nonexistent file throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 当用户单击 " **上传文件** " 按钮时，该文件的内容将在页面的文本框中显示为字节。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. 此示例使用 属性上传整个文件。This example uses the property to upload the entire file. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadFileBytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadFileBytes/CS/FileUploadFileBytesCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadFileBytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadFileBytes/VB/FileUploadFileBytesVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The entire file was not read.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileContent As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ FileContent { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象，它指向要使用 控件上载的文件。

span.span: Gets a object that points to a file to upload using the control.
A that points to a file to upload using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取一个 对象，该对象指向要使用控件上载的文件 。The property gets a object that points to a file to upload by using the control. 使用 属性访问该文件的内容。Use the property to access the contents of the file. 例如，你可以使用 此属性返回的对象将文件内容作为字节读取，并将其存储在字节数组中。For example, you can use the object that is returned by this property to read the contents of the file as bytes and store them in a byte array. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 属性用于将文件的内容读入字节数组。The property is used to read the contents of the file into a byte array. 当用户单击 " **上传文件** " 按钮时，该文件的内容将在页面的文本框中显示为字节。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/cs/fileupload.filecontentcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/VB/fileupload.filecontentvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取客户端上使用 控件上载的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of a file on a client to upload using the control.

value.span: 该字符串指定客户端上使用 上载的文件的名称。

span.span: A string that specifies the name of a file on a client to upload using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取客户端上使用 控件上载的文件的名称。Gets the name of a file on a client to upload using the control. 属性返回的文件名不包括客户端上文件的路径。The file name that the property returns does not include the path of the file on the client. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件将文件保存到在代码中指定的路径。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that saves files to a path that is specified in code. 属性用于获取要上传的文件的名称。The property is used to get the name of the file to upload. 调用方法以将文件保存到服务器上指定的路径，并使用该文件在客户端上的相同名称。The method is called to save the file to the specified path on the server, using the same name the file has on the client. 请注意，此示例演示此控件的基本语法，但并不演示在保存文件之前应完成的所有必要错误检查。Note that this example demonstrates the basic syntax for this control, but does not demonstrate all the necessary error checking that should be done before saving the file. 有关更完整的示例，请参见 。For a more complete example, see . [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/cs/fileuploadclass1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUploadClass1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUploadClass1/VB/fileuploadclass1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HasFile As Boolean
public: property bool HasFile { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件是否包含文件。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains a file.

value.span: 如果 包含文件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the contains a file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取一个值，该值指示 控件是否包含要上载的文件。The property gets a value indicating whether the control contains a file to upload. 使用此属性验证在对文件执行操作之前是否存在要上载的文件。Use this property to verify that a file to upload exists before performing operations on the file. 例如，在调用 方法以将文件保存到磁盘之前，请使用 属性来验证该文件是否存在。For example, before calling the method to save the file to disk, use the property to verify that the file exists. 如果 返回 `true` ，则调用 方法。If returns `true`, call the method. 如果它返回 `false` ，则向用户显示一条消息，指示该控件不包含文件。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 执行错误检查的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that performs error checking. 在保存文件之前， 调用方法以验证控件是否包含要上载的文件。Before saving the file, the method is called to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 此外， 调用方法以检查路径中是否已存在同名的文件。In addition, the method is called to check whether a file with the same name already occurs in the path. 如果是这样，则在调用方法之前，要上传的文件的名称以下划线字符为前缀 。If it does, the name of the file to upload is prefixed with an underscore character before the method is called. 这可以防止覆盖现有文件。This prevents the existing file from being overwritten. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/cs/fileupload.saveascs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/VB/fileupload.saveasvb.aspx#1)]

public: property bool HasFiles { bool get(); };

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether any files have been uploaded.

value.span: 如果上载任何文件中，则为；否则，为 。

span.span: if any files have been uploaded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `false`如果上载的空文件 (零字节) ，此方法也会返回。This method also returns `false` if an empty file (zero bytes) is uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知 控件在保存视图状态和呈现内容之前执行任何必需的预呈现步骤。The method notifies the control to perform any necessary pre-rendering steps before saving view state and rendering content.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PostedFile As HttpPostedFile
public: property System::Web::HttpPostedFile ^ PostedFile { System::Web::HttpPostedFile ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取使用 控件上载的文件的基础 对象。

span.span: Gets the underlying object for a file that is uploaded by using the control.

value.span: 使用 上载的文件的 。

span.span: An for a file uploaded by using the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取 使用控件上载的文件的基础对象 。The property gets the underlying object for a file that is uploaded by using the control. 使用此属性可以访问上载的文件上的其他属性。Use this property to access additional properties on the uploaded file. 您可以使用 属性来获取文件的长度。You can use the property to get the length of the file. 您可以使用 属性来获取文件的 MIME 内容类型。You can use the property to get the MIME content type of the file. 此外，还可以使用 属性来访问 属性、 属性和 方法。In addition, you can use the property to access the property, the property, and the method. 但是， 属性、 属性和方法提供了相同的功能 。However, the same functionality is provided by the property, the property, and the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control. 当用户单击 " **上传文件** " 按钮时，该文件的内容将在页面的文本框中显示为字节。When the user clicks the **Upload file** button, the contents of the file are displayed as bytes in a text box on the page. 此示例使用 属性访问 属性。This example uses the property to access the property. 属性用于确定文件的长度，然后将文件内容复制到字节数组。The property is used to determine the length of the file before copying the file contents to a byte array. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/cs/fileupload.filecontentcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.FileContent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.FileContent/VB/fileupload.filecontentvb.aspx#1)]

The collection of uploaded files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将 控件内容发送到指定的 对象，该对象写入要在客户端上呈现的内容。The method sends the control content to the specified object, which writes the content to render on the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SaveAs(string filename) cil managed

param.name: filename
param.span: 一个字符串，指定服务器上用于保存上载文件的位置的完整路径。

span.span: A string that specifies the full path of the location of the server on which to save the uploaded file.

summary.span: 将上载文件的内容保存到 Web 服务器上的指定路径。

span.span: Saves the contents of an uploaded file to a specified path on the Web server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将上载文件的内容保存到 Web 服务器上的指定路径。The method saves the contents of an uploaded file to a specified path on the Web server. 用户选择要上载的文件后，控件不会自动将文件保存到服务器。The control does not automatically save a file to the server after the user selects the file to upload. 您必须显式提供一个控件或机制以允许用户提交指定的文件。You must explicitly provide a control or mechanism to allow the user to submit the specified file. 例如，你可以提供一个按钮，用户单击它即可上传文件。For example, you can provide a button that the user clicks to upload the file. 你编写的用于保存指定文件的代码应调用 方法，该方法会将文件内容保存到服务器上的指定路径。The code that you write to save the specified file should call the method, which saves the contents of a file to a specified path on the server. 通常， 在引发回发到服务器的事件的事件处理方法中调用方法。Typically, the method is called in an event-handling method for an event that raises a post back to the server. 例如，如果你提供了一个按钮来提交文件，则将文件保存到服务器的代码可以包含在 click 事件的事件处理方法内。For example, if you provide a button to submit a file, the code to save the file to the server could then be included inside the event-handling method for the click event. 调用 方法时，必须指定要在其中保存上载文件的服务器上的目录的完整路径。When you call the method, you must specify the full path of the directory on the server in which to save the uploaded file. 如果未在应用程序代码中显式指定路径，则 当用户尝试上传文件时，将引发异常。If you do not explicitly specify a path in your application code, an exception is thrown when a user attempts to upload a file. 此行为可帮助用户指定要在其中保存其上传的文件的路径，从而有助于保护服务器上的文件。This behavior helps keep the files on the server secure, by not allowing users to specify a path in which to save the files that they upload. 在调用 方法之前，应使用 属性来验证 控件是否包含要上载的文件。Before calling the method, you should use the property to verify that the control contains a file to upload. 如果 返回 `true` ，则调用 方法。If the returns `true`, call the method. 如果它返回 `false` ，则向用户显示一条消息，指示该控件不包含文件。If it returns `false`, display a message to the user indicating that the control does not contain a file. 如果未提供错误处理代码来验证文件是否存在，则尝试保存不存在的文件会引发 异常。If you do not provide error-handling code to verify that a file exists, an attempt to save a nonexistent file throws an exception. 若要运行的调用 ，ASP.NET 应用程序必须具有对服务器上的目录的写访问权限。For a call to the to work, the ASP.NET application must have write access to the directory on the server. 应用程序可以通过两种方式获取写入访问权限。There are two ways that the application can get write access. 你可以在将保存上载文件的目录中显式授予对运行应用程序的帐户的写入权限。You can explicitly grant write access to the account under which the application is running, in the directory in which the uploaded files will be saved. 或者，可以增加授予 ASP.NET 应用程序的信任级别。Alternatively, you can increase the level of trust that is granted to the ASP.NET application. 若要对应用程序的执行目录进行写入访问，必须为应用程序授予 信任级别设置为值的对象 。To get write access to the executing directory for the application, the application must be granted the object with the trust level set to the value. 提高信任级别会增加应用程序访问服务器上资源的权限。Increasing the level of trust increases the application's access to resources on the server. 请注意，这并不是一种安全的方法，因为获得您的应用程序控制的恶意用户也可以在这一更高的信任级别下运行。Note that this is not a secure approach, because a malicious user who gains control of your application will also be able to run under this higher level of trust. 最佳做法是在具有运行该应用程序所需的最低权限的用户上下文中运行 ASP.NET 应用程序。It is a best practice to run an ASP.NET application in the context of a user who has the minimum privileges that are required for the application to run. 有关 ASP.NET 应用程序中的安全性的详细信息，请参阅 [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zdh19h94(v=vs.100)) 和 [ASP.NET 信任级别和策略文件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1)。For more information about security in ASP.NET applications, see [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zdh19h94(v=vs.100)) and [ASP.NET Trust Levels and Policy Files](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f897c794-10d3-414c-86b7-59b66564bbf1). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 执行错误检查的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that performs error checking. 在保存文件之前，将 调用方法来验证要上传的文件是否存在。Before the file is saved, the method is called to verify that a file to upload exists. 此外， 调用方法以检查路径中是否已存在同名的文件。In addition, the method is called to check whether a file that has the same name already exists in the path. 如果是这样，则在调用方法之前，要上传的文件的名称以数字为前缀 。If it does, the name of the file to upload is prefixed with a number before the method is called. 这可以防止覆盖现有文件。This prevents the existing file from being overwritten. [!code-aspx-csharp[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/cs/fileupload.saveascs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FileUpload.SaveAs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FileUpload.SaveAs/VB/fileupload.saveasvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: is not a full path.

related.span: Basic Security Practices for Web Applications（Web 应用程序的基本安全实践）

span.span: Basic Security Practices for Web Applications
